description:
Miyakoshi feels that something is missing regarding her dating Higashida, so she asks Muranushi and Kisaki for advice. However, in the end, she turns to her last resort, which results in a surprising development!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If Someone Hits You on the Right Cheek, Counter with Your Left Fist
Migi no Hoo o Naguraretara Hidariude de Counter
Si on te frappe la joue droite, contre avec le bras gauche
右の頬を殴られたら左腕でカウンター
